Class InternshipService

java.lang.Object
InternshipService
public class InternshipService extends Object
Service class for managing internship opportunities. Handles creation, approval, rejection, and visibility of internships.

  • Constructor Summary

    • createInternship

      public boolean createInternship(String userId, String title, String description, String level, String preferredMajor, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, int maxSlots, double minGPA)
      Creates a new internship opportunity.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID of the creator
      title - the title
      description - the description
      level - the level
      preferredMajor - the preferred major
      openingDate - the opening date
      closingDate - the closing date
      maxSlots - the max slots
      minGPA - the min GPA
      Returns:
      true if created successfully
